name: Scrapper Showdown
description:
Shoot, Scavenge, Scatter!

Scrapper Showdown is a local multiplayer twin-stick shooter in which players fly scavenger ships shooting their way through the wreckage of a massive, derelict spacecraft.

FEATURES

Multiple Win Objectives

Win by collecting scrap, destroying your opponent, or by detonating bombs on their side of the playing field.

Randomly Generated Levels

Scrapper Showdown's levels are randomly pieced together everytime you play to ensure that every match is different.

Local Multiplayer

Invite your friends over for couch multiplayer and prepare for trash talking and friendly competition.

REQUIREMENTS

Controller

Scrapper Showdown is only playable with two Xbox Controllers. Other variants may work but are not officially supported.

Local Multiplayer Only

There is no online multiplayer. Invite your friends over and play together in person!

PLAY THE DEMO NOW!

Visit our website, ScrapperShowdown.com, and download the free demo of the game now, or find a download link below! It contains all the features of the main game, except for the randomly generated levels. There is a tutorial so that you may familiarize yourself with how to play the game, and one premade level for you to try out!
